links.description: MT: ArcelorMittal misses by $0.09, beats on revs (14.10) Reports Q3 (Sep) loss of $0.16 per share, $0.09 worse than the S&P Capital IQ Consensus of ($0.07); revenues fell 20.2% year/year to $13.27 bln vs the $12.69 bln S&P Capital IQ Consensus.

links.title: Arcelormittal (MT) Reports 3rd Quarter Earnings
links.description: Arcelormittal (MT) reported a 3rd Quarter September 2020 loss of $0.15 per share on revenue of $13.3 billion. The consensus estimate was a loss of $0.19 per share on revenue of $12.3 billion. Revenue fell 20.2% compared to the same quarter a year ago.

links.title: ArcelorMittal completes ~$500M buyback program
links.description: ArcelorMittal completes buyback of 35.64M shares at market close on Oct. 30, at an approximate average price of €11.92/share.This repurchase program was announced on Sept. 28, 2020 and was scheduled to be completed by March 31, 2021.Total value of buyback is approximately €424.93M or US$499.99M.Stock is up 2.21% in pre-market action.
